pair.value: This process model handles the activity for generating the notification letter in the event of validating external user against a customer.
="USR_Generate Notification Letter for user : " & pv!user_cdt.userFirstName & " " & pv!user_cdt.userSurname
This task will bring the configuration values that will be required to populate the template data in the approval/refusal letter.
This will generate the approval letter for authorising user to access nominated customer data.
This will generate the refusal letter for authorising user to access nominated customer data.

acp.name: NewDocDesc
acp.a:expr: ="Letter of refusal for user " & pv!user_cdt.userFirstName & " " & pv!user_cdt.userSurname

pair.value: This will generate the approval email for authorising user to access nominated customer data.

This gateway determine the template to be populated depending of the notification/action type specified. Supported types: 1. Approve (output: doc) 2. Refuse (output: doc) 3. Approve (output:html) 4. Refuse (output: html)
Note: the current supported notification context is only for External User Registration purpose. To use this for other notification, you need to ensure the proper parameter has been supplied to populate your custom template and the new template must be added into the workflow of this process model.

annotation.text:
Name: USR_Generate Notification Letter
Description: This process model handles the activity for generating the notification letter in the event of validating external user against a customer.
